item.title: South Korea's impeached President Yoon faces arrest as court issues warrant, deepening political turmoil
item.description: A warrant for South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol was approved by a Seoul court on Tuesday. Yoon is the first sitting South Korean president to face ...

item.title: Asia-Pacific markets mostly lower after China manufacturing growth misses expectations
item.description: The country's official purchasing managers' index for December came in at 50.1, data released by the National Bureau of Statistics data showed.

item.title: China's December factory activity growth misses expectations as analysts decry insufficient stimulus
item.description: China's factory activity expanded for a third straight month in December, but growth slowed and also missed Reuters' poll expectations.

item.title: Stock futures tick lower as S&P 500 closes out second year in a row with 20% gain: Live updates
item.description: The S&P has surged more than 24% this year, on pace for its second consecutive annual gain above 20%.

item.title: Want to invest in weight loss drugs? Here’s where UBS thinks they’re headed in 2025
item.description: UBS expects that BioPharma "will find it difficult to outperform against a more uncertain macro backdrop," in the short-to medium-term.
